title: HOLY CRAP PENTAKILL
body:
I just got a pentakill 7-ish minutes ago as


GUESS





Teemo

guys it was insane
cause it kept on using my poison on everyone and then they got shrekt
and then the nidalee, the final person after the quadrakill, was about to get away, but then the rengar on my team, named TyvekTGR (Ur a legend mate), trapped her and i killed her for the penta.
I was teamed with a friend called xXJoshuaXx, and in the enemy team, (now we're in the same club) was a person named Tiana the Tissue, and PArmigiano Chees (sorry if i didnt spell that right)
couldn'tve done it without you guys, thanks

replies.body:
First penta was on {{champion:9}} , back on NA server (before OCE and ARAM existed).
Enemy team were all pushing bot, attacking a turret, I ult over wall from jungle, kill 4 of them, and only {{champion:103}}  was left. She had a decision, run towards me, or back into turret. She chose turret but I got the 1v5 penta anyway.

Best penta's I've had were 1v5 full tank {{champion:32}} with the assist of a {{champion:26}}  ult (he ulted me and bailed, without actually attacking), and a {{champion:96}}  penta at level 4 or something (it was ARAM).

First penta was on morder hue back when he was a monster

We were at there base a teamfight broke out i ulted one of there ranged carries flashed in killed him then me and the ghost did the rest while i took no damage

Rip op shield.
My first penta was in ARAM on karthus and I killed them all just with my q
cool one shot penta, but in ARAM so not so impressive :/
Not a one shot lol I meant I got them all using just my q
Grats, but can you do it on a cold day in stoke.
u cant do it on dodo tho
i can and have, only with kalista instead.

Hahha congrats. I remember my first penta with yi ( ik it's a cancer champ but still...) my team had a teamfight without me and 3 of my team were dead, the whole enemy team was low so I ulted and q, instant quadra then I chased the enemy blitzcrank to his turret and got the penta :D
well teemo is a cancer champion too eh?

Nice!

My first penta was with a Sivir in early S5 ranked.
